Class ReplenishmentRequest

java.lang.Object
medicine.ReplenishmentRequest
public class ReplenishmentRequest extends Object
The ReplenishmentRequest class handles the creation, updating, and display of replenishment requests for medicines. It interacts with the ReplenishmentDB to manage these operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a ReplenishmentRequest with a given database reference.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:

    • loadDB

      public void loadDB() throws IOException
      Loads the database for replenishment requests.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while loading the database

    • submitRequest

      public boolean submitRequest(String medicationId, int quantity, Medicine medicine)
      Submits a replenishment request if the stock is low. If a request for the medicine already exists, the quantity is updated; otherwise, a new request is created.
      Parameters:
      medicationId - the ID of the medicine to request replenishment for
      quantity - the quantity to request
      medicine - the Medicine object to check for stock status
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully submitted, false otherwise

    • displayAllRequests

      public void displayAllRequests()
      Displays all replenishment requests stored in the database.
